Events.Text: Use your imagination to generate a conversation about the topics 'checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting' (in any order), as shown on the left. You may also ask the assistant about the weather.  [instruction 1 of 6]
Hi, I am Angela. I want to check the status of my ride with ID 823

DetailedWalkingInstructions: Walk 2 blocks east on Forbes Avenue towards Murray. You will pass a fire station on your left.
Turn right and walk for 3 blocks until you arrive at the tall brown church. Cross the street after arriving at the church.
Turn left and walk for 5 minutes. You will pass a school on your right. Keep going until you see the park on your left.
Your destination will be on the right besides the Starbucks.

Item.Message: That person has a conflicting meeting at that time. Try another meeting time.

PrimaryItem.Message: That person has a conflicting meeting at that time. Try another meeting time.

Events.Text: Michael has a conflicting meeting at that time, do you have another time in mind?

PrimaryItem.Message: That person has a conflicting meeting at that time. Try another meeting time.

Events.Text:
Unfortunately Michael is not able to make Friday @ 4 pm.
Would you like to try scheduling the meeting for a different day or time?
What about on Thursday? I'm free all day. Any time will work as long as it is a 2 hour meeting.

Ok, once you've touched on all the topics ('checking ride status', 'getting directions', and 'schedule a meeting') and engaged in some smalltalk, you can bring the conversation to a natural close. [instruction 6 of 6]

Scenario.UserTask:
Come up with your own scenario!

About you:
- Your name: Angela

 The AI Assistant can handle:
- Check your ride's status (e.g. ride id 823)
- Get walking/driving/transit directions (e.g. from 'Forbes and Murray' to 'Craig and Center') 
- Schedule a meeting
- Checking the weather forecast in different Cities (e.g. Los Angeles or San Francisco)
Scenario.WizardTask: Follow the flow charts and help the user.

UserQuestionnaire.Question: Did the assistant stay calm and helpful throughout the dialogue?

WizardQuestionnaire.Question: Did the user change his/her mind about what he/she wants at any time?
Did the user become aggressive or annoyed during the dialogue? (Note: some users may be instructed to be annoying.)
Where you unsure about what to do at any time? (Feel free to send us an email with details.)
